Car-Trunk Shovel Collapsable with Adjustable Handle

Got snow??? The Car-Trunk Shovel Collapsable with Adjustable Handle is light weight, and conveniently tucks away in the trunk just in case.

Bigfoot™ Brushes

  • Works great for emergencies!
  • Collapsable handle
  • Adjustable handle
  • 28-48'' inches
  • Lightweight, durable poly construction
  • Sturdy metal shaft 
  • Easy to store
  • Blade size: 10” x 13” (25.4cm x 33.02cm)
  • QTY-6

entry.title: Winter-Snow Removal Big Foot 42" Telescoping Snowbroom & Heavy Duty Ice Scraper
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wholesale Resort Accessories Dev
Type: Snow Removal Accessories

Big Foot 42" Telescoping Snowbroom & Heavy Duty Ice Scraper

Clears with convenience, the Big Foot 42" Telescoping Snowbroom & Heavy Duty Ice Scraper adjusts in length and offers a wide blade and broom for quick and clear results.

Bigfoot™ Brushes

  • Provides up to 100% longer reach when extended
  • Wide blade and broom extend to 42 inches
  • Great for larger vehicles
  • Assorted handle colors Black -Blue, Black-Yellow, Black-Red
  •  42”  telescoping handle
  • Two-Position pivoting brush and scraper head
  • Lightweight aluminum handle
  • Cushion comfort grip
  • 8 Pieces per display
  • QTY-24; Minimum 3 Case Packs of (8)
